mapper.insert: insert into tb_brand (brandID, varietyID, brandname, create_time, update_time) values (#{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{varietyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_brand ORDER BY brandID ASC ;
